name: Syst√®me d'entretien RH aliment√© par l'IA avec BeyondPresence
description:
## Quel probl√®me cela r√©sout-il ?

Le filtrage manuel des candidats prend du temps et est incoh√©rent. Ce flux de travail automatise les entretiens initiaux, offrant une disponibilit√© 24/7, des questions coh√©rentes et des √©valuations objectives pour chaque candidat.

## Pour qui est-ce ?

- √âquipes RH g√©rant un recrutement √† fort volume
- Petites entreprises sans recruteurs d√©di√©s
- Entreprises qui d√©veloppent leur processus de recrutement
- Organisations d'abord √† distance ayant besoin d'un filtrage asynchrone

## Ce que fait ce flux de travail

Cr√©e des interviewers IA √† partir de descriptions de poste qui m√®nent des conversations naturelles avec les candidats via les agents BeyondPresence. Analyse automatiquement les entretiens et enregistre des √©valuations structur√©es dans Google Sheets.

## Configuration
1. **Installer le n≈ìud communautaire Beyond Presence** : Beyond Presence a un [n≈ìud communautaire v√©rifi√©](https://n8n.io/integrations/beyond-presence/) que vous pouvez installer facilement depuis le panneau de recherche de n≈ìuds.

2. **Copier le mod√®le de feuille** : [Mod√®le de syst√®me d'entretien RH BeyondPresence](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dXLpP5bRRirBsln4YIQtFgb1MiP-0yR8IDRzse5k7X0/copy)
2. **Ajouter des identifiants** :
   - Cl√© API BeyondPresence
   - API OpenAI
   - Google Sheets
3. **Configurer le webhook** dans le tableau de bord BeyondPresence :
   `https://[votre-webhook-n8n-production]`
4. **Coller la description de poste** dans le n≈ìud "Votre description de poste" et ex√©cuter le flux de configuration
5. **Partager le lien d'entretien g√©n√©r√©** avec les candidats
6. **Obtenir l'analyse de l'entretien dans Google Sheet** D√®s que les candidats terminent l'entretien avec votre agent IA, vous commencerez √† recevoir des r√©sultats dans Google Sheet.

## Comment cela fonctionne
1. **Cr√©ation d'agent** : Convertit la description de poste en interviewer IA conversationnel
2. **Conduite de l'entretien** : Les candidats discutent naturellement avec l'IA via le lien partag√©
3. **D√©clencheur de webhook** : Les entretiens compl√©t√©s sont envoy√©s √† n8n
4. **Analyse IA** : OpenAI √©value les r√©ponses par rapport aux exigences du poste
5. **Stockage des r√©sultats** : Les √©valuations sont enregistr√©es dans Google Sheets avec des scores et des recommandations

## Ressources
- [Mod√®le Google Sheets](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dXLpP5bRRirBsln4YIQtFgb1MiP-0yR8IDRzse5k7X0/copy)
- [Documentation BeyondPresence](https://docs.bey.dev/introduction)
- [Guide de configuration du webhook](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.webhook/)

## Exemple de cas d'utilisation
Une startup technologique filtre 200 candidats pour un poste d'ing√©nieur. Cr√©e un interviewer IA en 2 minutes, envoie le lien √† tous les candidats. Re√ßoit des √©valuations structur√©es dans les 24 heures, identifiant les 20 meilleurs candidats pour des entretiens humains. R√©duit le temps de filtrage initial de 2 semaines √† 2 jours.

workflow.name: AI-Powered HR Interview System with BeyondPresence

parameters.content:
## üìù Step 1: Add Your Job Description

**Simply paste your complete job posting in the job description node**

Include:
- Job title
- Company name
- Responsibilities
- Requirements
- Any other relevant details

The AI will understand everything from your text!

parameters.jsCode:
// ========== PASTE YOUR JOB DESCRIPTION HERE ==========
// Simply paste your entire job posting between the quotes below
// Include everything: job title, company name, requirements, etc.

const jobDescription = `
Product Marketing Manager ‚Äì BeyondPresence.ai

BeyondPresence.ai is redefining human-computer interaction with hyper-realistic, emotionally intelligent digital avatars and Conversational Video Agents that deliver human-like, real-time conversations at scale. Our proprietary AI technology powers next-generation customer support, sales, HR, and training experiences for leading brands worldwide. We are seeking a dynamic Product Marketing Manager to drive the go-to-market strategy and accelerate adoption of our cutting-edge platform.

Responsibilities
Develop and execute go-to-market strategies for new and existing BeyondPresence.ai products, with a focus on driving demand, adoption, and customer engagement.

Craft compelling product positioning and messaging that differentiates our conversational avatars and platform in the market.

Conduct market, competitor, and user research to identify trends, customer needs, and growth opportunities.

Build and maintain detailed buyer personas to guide targeted marketing and sales initiatives.

Collaborate closely with product, engineering, and sales teams to align on product vision, roadmap, and feature launches.

Lead cross-functional product launches, including launch planning, sales enablement, and campaign execution.

Create and manage marketing collateral, demos, website content, case studies, and sales tools that clearly communicate product value.

Gather and analyze customer feedback and campaign performance data to optimize messaging and marketing programs.

Support the sales team with training, product presentations, and competitive insights to drive conversions and upsells.

Represent BeyondPresence.ai at industry events, webinars, and customer meetings as a product evangelist.

Requirements
4+ years of experience in product marketing, preferably in B2B SaaS, AI, or related technology sectors.

Proven track record of launching and scaling innovative technology products, ideally in AI, conversational platforms, or digital avatars.

Deep understanding of go-to-market strategies, product positioning, and value-based messaging.

Exceptional written and verbal communication skills, including copywriting and storytelling.

Strong analytical skills with experience in market research, data analysis, and campaign optimization.

Demonstrated ability to influence and collaborate with cross-functional teams without direct authority.

Experience supporting sales teams with enablement materials and training.

Bachelor‚Äôs degree in marketing, business, or a related field; advanced degree a plus.

Passion for emerging technologies, AI, and shaping the future of human-computer interaction.

Why BeyondPresence.ai?
Join a visionary, fast-growing team with deep expertise in AI, avatars, and conversational technology.

Shape the future of digital communication and help global brands deliver human-like experiences at scale.

Work with a collaborative, mission-driven team backed by proven founders and industry leaders.

Competitive compensation, flexible work environment, and opportunities for rapid career growth.

Ready to help define the future of human-AI interaction? Apply now and join BeyondPresence.ai!
`;

// Don't change anything below this line
return [{
  json: {
    jobDescription: jobDescription.trim(),
    timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
  }
}];

parameters.content:
## üöÄ Step 2: Create Your Interview Agent

**Click the button below to:**
1. Create your AI interviewer
2. Get your interview link

This only needs to be done ONCE!

## ‚úÖ Setup Complete!

**Your interview link:**
`https://bey.chat/[agent-id]`

** This step will now setup our agent id and job description which is now automatically passed and used by our webhook.

## ü§ñ Step 3: Automated Interview Analysis

**This section runs automatically to:**
- Receive completed interviews
- Analyze candidate responses
- Save results to Google Sheets

**Before activating:** 
Make sure to configure the webhook URL in your BeyondPresence dashboard under Settings ‚Üí Webhooks

values.content:
=Analyze this job interview and provide a hiring assessment.

Job Description:
{{ $json['Job Description'] }}

Candidate: {{ $('Handle webhook event').item.json.user.name }}
Duration: {{ $('Handle webhook event').item.json.call_details.duration_minutes }} minutes

Candidate Transcript:
{{ $('Handle webhook event').item.json.messages.map(m => `[${m.timestamp}] ${m.sender.toUpperCase()}: ${m.message}`).join('\n') }}

Provide a comprehensive assessment including:
1. Overall fit score (0-100)
2. Key strengths
3. Any concerns or gaps
4. Hiring recommendation
5. Suggested next steps

Format your response as JSON:
```json
{
  "fitScore": 85,
  "recommendation": "recommend",
  "strengths": ["strength 1", "strength 2", "strength 3"],
  "concerns": ["concern 1", "concern 2"],
  "summary": "Brief 2-3 sentence overall assessment",
  "nextSteps": ["suggested action 1", "suggested action 2"]
}
```

parameters.content:
## üìä Google Sheets Connection

**Quick Start**:
1. Use the same document but select **'Interview Results'**  sheet this time, the template includes all required columns!

**Connect your Google Sheets here ‚Üí**

## ‚ö†Ô∏è **Important**

### 1. First get an API key from https://app.bey.chatt , to use desired avatar copy paste avatar id from https://app.bey.chat/avatars in "Create Interview Agent Node"

### 2. You must run setup flow once so your google sheet has at least one row in interview agents.

### 3. Make sure to configure the webhook URL in your BeyondPresence dashboard under Settings ‚Üí Webhooks using your production webhook after activating flow

### 4. We use the latest created agent from step 1, if you want to choose a specific agent then manually copy paste agentId from step 1 "save agent info" node and filter it for column Agent ID in "Get agent info"  node.

## üîç Interview Processing & AI Assessment

1. Extract Interview Data: Captures candidate responses and metadata from completed interviews
2. AI Interview Analysis: Uses OpenAI to evaluate candidate fit against job requirements
3. Format Assessment Results: Structures AI insights for easy review and decision-making

The AI analyzes:
- Overall fit score (0-100)
- Key strengths demonstrated
- Potential concerns or skill gaps
- Hiring recommendation level
- Suggested next steps
- Summary of candidate suitability

This comprehensive analysis helps HR teams make data-driven hiring decisions by providing consistent, objective assessments of each candidate's interview performance.

## üìä Google Sheets Setup

**Quick Start**:
1. Copy our template sheet:  https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dXLpP5bRRirBsln4YIQtFgb1MiP-0yR8IDRzse5k7X0/copy
2. Connect your account credential in the node.
3. Update the Google Sheets node with your new document and select **'Interview Agents'**  sheet
 (if not automatically set)
3. You will get interview link in this sheet which you can share with candidates and start interviewing

**Connect your Google Sheets here ‚Üí**
